meanings.definition: A device for receiving television signals and displaying them on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The televisor in the living room shows colorful pictures.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new televisor for my bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The televisor seemed to have a mind of its own, changing channels randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the televisor, as if under a spell.
meanings.sent5: The televisor lit up the room with its bright display.

meanings.definition: To watch television on a televisor.
meanings.sent1: We often televisor together in the evenings.
meanings.sent2: I televisor my favorite show last night.
meanings.sent3: He would rather televisor than go out with friends.
meanings.sent4: She televisor with such intensity, it was as if nothing else existed.
meanings.sent5: Televisoring late at night keeps me awake.
